original_text: When the angel who spoke to him had gone, Cornelius called two of his servants and a devout soldier who was one of his attendants.
korean_text: 마침 말하던 천사가 떠나매 고넬료가 집안 하인 둘과 부하 가운데 경건한 사람 하나를 불러

sentences.original_text: When the angel who spoke to him had gone,
Cornelius called two of his servants
sentences.korean_translation: 코넬리우스는 자신의 종 두 사람을 부르고
그리고 경건한 군사 한 사람을 불렀는데,

sentences.original_text: who was one of his attendants.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 시종 중 한 사람이었다.
